Features.title: ChatBot
Features.text: Live chatbot to help setup your business page with ease!

Features.title: Post Ads
Features.text: Post product ads at the click of a button! It is the first thing customers are able to view when they visit Jugaad.

Features.title: Live Stream
Features.text: Interact live with potential customers by showcasing your products and recieve donations!

Features.title: Unified Platform
Features.text: All in one platform for starting your online business with ease!
